channel.title: Posts on dreamdrew.ca
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on dreamdrew.ca

item.title: first post
item.description: I decided over the holidays that I’d like to learn more about hugo and figured that using hugo to add a blog to my site would be a good way to learn and give me a place to blog. I started with the hugo documentation and wanted to start building a new hugo theme from scratch. I found this tutorial on creating a new theme to be useful.
